flawed_nl_solution:
The left-hand mice cost 120*0.3=$<<120*0.3=36>>36 more than right-handed ones
So they cost 120+36=$<<120+36=156>>156
So he makes 156*25=$<<156*25=3090>>3090 a day
The store is open 7-3=<<7-3=4>>4 days a week
So in a week, he makes 3090*4=$<<3090*4=12360>>12360

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 3900.0, not 3090.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
